name: Yattrssc
tagline: yet Another Tiny Tiny RSS Client
body:
YATTRSSC - Yet Another Tiny Tiny RSS Client
===========================================

Simple client for accessing instances of Tiny Tiny RSS (http://tt-rss.org/). 
Allows you to read and manage your feeds, add tags and sharing posts on Facebook and Twitter. 

### Technology
Phonegap + JQuery Mobile 1.3

### Platforms

Android ([Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.andreafortuna.yattrssc))

iOs (under Apple review)

Blackberry (under RIM review)
